Board.name: click_on_letter
Board.author: Pascal Georges (pascal.georges1@free.fr)
Board.title: Click on a lowercase letter
Board.description: Listen to a letter and click on the right one
Board.prerequisite: Visual letter-recognition. Can move the mouse.
Board.manual: A letter is spoken. Click on the matching letter in the main area. You can listen to the letter again, by clicking on the mouth icon in the bottom box.
